title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.103 - Cured beef tongue
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 319.103 - Cured beef tongue

State Regulations

In preparing "Cured Beef Tongue", the application of
curing solution to the fresh beef tongue shall not result in an increase in the
weight of the cured beef tongue of more than 10 percent over the weight of the
fresh uncured beef tongue. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
319.103

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
